title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-debt-tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML that allows users to monitor and manage their sleep debt. This tool helps individuals visualize their sleep patterns and identify potential areas for improvement, ultimately promoting better sleep hygiene. It is a practical application showcasing TypeScript implementation for building interactive web applications.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript that provides a platform for creating and participating in various types of online voting events. This repository houses the codebase for a versatile voting system, encompassing features such as user authentication, vote casting, real-time results, and administration tools. It serves as a central hub for development and collaboration related to this voting application.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the source code for my resume, built using a combination of TeX for generating the PDF and HTML for web-based viewing. The project explores different ways to present professional experience and skills in a clear and effective manner, serving as a personal project for showcasing my qualifications.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository provides a web-based interface, built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, for visualizing and interacting with data from Robofleet robotics platforms. This project aims to provide a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring robot status, sensor data, and mission progress, serving as a valuable tool for robotics developers and operators working within the Robofleet ecosystem.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project exploring the creation and display of interactive maps using HTML and Python. It aims to visualize geographical data and present it in a user-friendly and informative way. This repository encompasses code and resources related to map generation, data integration, and interactive elements within a web-based mapping environment.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask, designed to interact with a PostgreSQL database. This project utilizes HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting alongside Python for its functionality and deployment, serving as a practical example for learning and implementing web applications and database interactions. It explores topics such as CRUD operations, web development with Flask, database management with PostgreSQL, and general project structure.

This project, built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, explores and implements a range of modern web development techniques. Focused on a specific project within the larger realm of project management, this repository provides a practical example of how these technologies can be integrated to create a functional and responsive web application.

title: atg-world
description: The atg-world repository is a project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It encompasses development related to the defined project scope, leveraging modern web technologies to achieve its goals. This repository serves as the central location for source code, documentation, and related resources for the atg-world project.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project utilizing TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to create a dynamic and collaborative idea-boarding application. This repository focuses on providing a platform for brainstorming, organizing, and developing project ideas in a structured and visually appealing manner.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for filtering, searching, and interpreting ROS logs, facilitating efficient debugging and troubleshooting in robotics projects. It falls under the "project" category, serving as a practical application for ROS developers.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to demonstrate a modern web dashboard implementation using the Next.js framework. It showcases best practices for structuring Next.js applications and provides a foundation for building scalable and interactive user interfaces for data visualization and management. This repository serves as a practical example and learning resource for web developers looking to create robust dashboards with Next.js.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project repository primarily built using TypeScript and JavaScript. It serves as a hub for the development and management of [briefly state the project's purpose/function, e.g., "a modern web application," "a data processing pipeline," or "a collection of utility scripts"]. This repository encompasses all aspects related to the project's lifecycle, from initial development to ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: dynamic-event-calendar is a project built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to create a dynamic and interactive event calendar. This repository provides a foundation for displaying, managing, and interacting with event data, offering a flexible and customizable solution for integrating event scheduling into web applications. The project focuses on providing a user-friendly interface and dynamic functionality for a seamless event calendar experience.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a Next.js project built with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Supabase for real-time tracking of IoT assets. This repository provides a comprehensive solution utilizing modern web development technologies to visualize and manage the location and status of connected devices, demonstrating a practical application of IoT data and highlighting best practices in frontend architecture and database integration.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Vite.js, and Express.js to create a platform that leverages the Gemini API. The repository showcases a modern web application stack, demonstrating how to integrate with AI services using TypeScript and providing a foundation for future project development utilizing the Gemini API.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a project management application built with Next.js 14 (utilizing the pages router), TypeScript, and styled with CSS and Material UI (MUI). It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, providing a robust and performant user experience while demonstrating modern web development best practices with a focus on clean code and maintainability.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebooks and Python, contains a collection of finance-related projects. It explores various financial concepts and analyses, aiming to demonstrate practical applications of Python in areas such as portfolio management, financial modeling, and data analysis for investment strategies.

title: fruit-seller
description: fruit-seller is an e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and JavaScript, leveraging MUI for the user interface and React Query for efficient data fetching. This project serves as a demonstration of a type-safe, modern web application focused on fruit sales and explores various aspects of front-end development with a focus on practical application.
